body_html: @Giszy First, you should fork this repo. And then, if there're only changes with a file, you can edit it online. Otherwise, you should make a commit and push it. Finally, you visit the main page of this repo and you can see compare & pull request, click the button and you can finish with that.

body: @Giszy First, you should fork this repo. And then, if there're only changes with a file, you can edit it online. Otherwise, you should make a commit and push it. Finally, you visit the main page of this repo and you can see compare & pull request, click the button and you can finish with that.
